attributes.action: Ensure that scientology is not classed as a religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in the UK respect the rights of people to believe in what they like; but scientology is quickly proving itself to be a manipulative and controlling cult. We must ensure that we don't allow scientology to become a recognised faith while we still can.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
